channel.title: Dropping items problem [PI]

item.title: Dropping items problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @A_G_S_P_U_R_E A G S P U R E
item.description:
@A_G_S_P_U_R_E wrote:

Hey Moparscape! I have a small issue with my dropping items part of my server.

I am currently trying to implement a code which it allows staff to be able to drop items on the ground. (for drop partys and such) Whilst NOT allowing any other players to drop their items. For example;

				if (c.playerRights == 3)) {
				Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId());
				c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, c.playerItemsN[slot])
				return;
				}
				if (c.playerRights =< 3)) {
				c.sendMessage("Your item dissapeared after it touched the ground.");
				c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, c.playerItemsN[slot]);
				server.model.players.PlayerSave.saveGame(c);
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("This item cannot be dropped.");
			}
		}

	}

But, my idea is not working I keep getting errors;

Help!

Read full topic
